params.name: type
params.description: Type of trace exporter (e.g: azure, zipkin). Use `zipkin` for jaeger

options.name: tracing.configProperties
options.description: Configurations specific to each tracer configured in `tracing.type`

params.name: endpoint
params.description: Tracing data receiver's endpoint path. Applicable only for Jaeger and Zipkin tracers

params.name: host
params.description: Tracing data receiver's host. Applicable only for Jaeger and Zipkin tracers

params.name: port
params.description: Tracing data receiver host's port. Applicable only for Jaeger and Zipkin tracers

params.name: connectionString
params.description: Azure App Insights connection string. Applicable only for Azure Insights

params.name: instrumentationName
params.description: Reference name for the Choreo Connect service in the tracer.

params.name: maximumTracesPerSecond
params.description: Number of trace events to publish per second

params.name: maxPathLength
params.description: Maximum length of the request path to extract and include in the HttpUrl tag.

params.name: connectionTimeout
params.description: Connection timeout for the OTLP service
